name: Swordmaster Kael
description: A tall anime man with striking features and flowing hair, expertly wielding a long and sharp sword that glints in the sunlight. His posture exudes confidence and skill, ready to engage in battle with agility and precision.

attacks.name: Blade Slash
attacks.description: A swift slash of the sword, aiming to cut through opponents with precision.

attacks.name: Whirlwind Strike
attacks.description: A spinning attack that damages all nearby enemies with a fast swing of the sword.

attacks.name: Piercing Thrust
attacks.description: A focused thrust directed at a single enemy, delivering a powerful blow.

attacks.name: Defensive Parry
attacks.description: A defensive move that counters an enemy attack, dealing damage in response.
